name: Airforce Online
description:
Controls

Movement: Arrow Keys

Fire: Spacebar

Toggle Auto Shoot: E

Information

This game is only a demo, and I will be working on it for a while. The upgrades and points you can collect in the game are not yet used for anything, as they are still a work in progress.

!!! There's currently a known bug where when you start the game, it sends you to the game over screen, but when you press start again you can play the game as intended. !!!
